award_title: CDS&E: Robust Symmetry-Preserving Machine Learning: Theory and Application
subject: Making computational methods reusable beyond the paper
body:
Hi Wei,

NSF increasingly expects computational work to be accessible and reusable, but that's hard to evidence in practiceâ€”especially for methods involving symmetry-preserving architectures and geometric deep learning.

Ouro provides a thin API layer over computational workflows, letting other researchers reuse methods directly instead of recreating them from papers. It makes demonstrating real-world accessibility simpler without major workflow changes.

Happy to give you a quick peek if it's useful.

Best,

Matt
Founder
https://ouro.foundation
